This data layer is an updated version of WISP2003. </abstract> <purpose>To represent the extent of Vermont's WISP Broadband System as of 12/31/2006.</purpose> </descript> <timeperd> <timeinfo> <sngdate> <caldate>20061231</caldate> <time>Unknown</time> </sngdate> </timeinfo> <current>Ground Conditions</current> </timeperd> <status> <progress>Complete</progress> <update>Annually</update> </status> <spdom> <bounding> <westbc>-73.454162</westbc> <eastbc>-71.465281</eastbc> <northbc>45.018361</northbc> <southbc>42.722789</southbc> </bounding> </spdom> <keywords> <theme> <themekt>ISO 19115 Topic Category</themekt> <themekey>utilitiesCommunication</themekey> </theme> <theme> <themekt>None</themekt> <themekey>Wireless Internet Providers</themekey> <themekey>WISP</themekey> <themekey>broadband</themekey> </theme> <place> <placekt>None</placekt> <placekey>Vermont</placekey> </place> <temporal> <tempkt>None</tempkt> <tempkey>2005</tempkey> </temporal> </keywords> <accconst>VCGI, VPS, and the State of VT make no representations of any kind, including but not limited to the warranties of merchantability or fitness for a particular use, nor are any such warranties to be implied with respect to the data.</accconst> <useconst>None. Variable accuracy.  Caution should be used.</horizpar> </horizpa> </posacc> <lineage> <srcinfo> <srccite> <citeinfo> <origin>VT Department of Public Servcie</origin> <pubdate>20070126</pubdate> <pubtime>unknown</pubtime> <title>VT Cable Systems 2005</title> <geoform>vector digital data</geoform> <pubinfo> <pubplace>Montpelier, VT</pubplace> </pubinfo> </citeinfo> </srccite> <srcscale>Various</srcscale> <typesrc>Various</typesrc> <srctime> <timeinfo> <sngdate> <caldate>20061231</caldate> <time>Unknown</time> </sngdate> </timeinfo> <srccurr>Publication Date</srccurr> </srctime> <srccontr> Various methods and sources were used to create this layer. Most companies provided VPS with a digital image (not georeferenced) of their coverage areas.  VCGI georeferenced these images, extracted the "coverage area" information, then appended them to WISP2006.  Viewshed analysis methods were used to generate other WISP coverage areas.  Caution should be used when using this data layer. </srccontr> </srcinfo> <procstep> <procdesc> VCGI assisted VPS with updates to this layer.  All attributes have been stripped from this layer prior to public release.
